V. Standard BBCode Library

[ Previous: IV.J. Miscellaneous Support Functions | Next: B. Text Styles ]

A. Alphabetical BBCode List

Section V of the user's manual documents all of the "out-of-the-box" BBCode codes that NBBC supports: These codes are provided by NBBC by default; if you don't want them, you'll have to specifically remove them with RemoveRule.

  • Text Styles:
    • [b]...[/b]
    • [i]...[/i]
    • [u]...[/u]
    • [s]...[/s]
    • [sup]...[/sup]
    • [sub]...[/sub]
    • [spoiler]...[/spoiler]
    • [acronym]...[/acronym]
    • [size]...[/size]
    • [color]...[/color]
    • [font]...[/font]
  • Links:
    • [url]...[/url]
    • [email]...[/email]
    • [wiki]
  • Replaced Items:
    • [img]...[/img]
    • [rule]
    • [br]
  • Alignment:
    • [center]...[/center]
    • [left]...[/left]
    • [right]...[/right]
    • [indent]...[/indent]
  • Columns:
    • [columns]...[/columns]
    • [nextcol]
  • Containers:
    • [code]...[/code]
    • [quote]...[/quote]
  • Lists:
    • [list]...[/list]
    • [*]...
  • Alphabetical:
    • [*]...
    • [acronym]...[/acronym]
    • [b]...[/b]
    • [br]
    • [center]...[/center]
    • [code]...[/code]
    • [color]...[/color]
    • [columns]...[/columns]
    • [email]...[/email]
    • [font]...[/font]
    • [i]...[/i]
    • [img]...[/img]
    • [indent]...[/indent]
    • [left]...[/left]
    • [list]...[/list]
    • [nextcol]
    • [quote]...[/quote]
    • [right]...[/right]
    • [rule]
    • [s]...[/s]
    • [size]...[/size]
    • [spoiler]...[/spoiler]
    • [sub]...[/sub]
    • [sup]...[/sup]
    • [u]...[/u]
    • [url]...[/url]
    • [wiki]
